entry.title: Face My Fears
entry.summary:
Author: MysticRose1992

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 40,629Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 1,365

Summary: During what Red Hood thought was just a routine check of all of the warehouses in his territory, making sure no new gang was going to start a gang war, he stumbles upon a scene that would haunt his nightmares. A Death Cult about to sacrifice a child that could be no older than 4. After dealing with the cult members, Jason finds himself the new caretaker of a 4 year old toddler that also happens to be able to turn invisible when startled. What could possibly go wrong?

entry.title: Multifaceted People
entry.summary:
Author: mustangisinflames

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,429Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 13

Summary: "Clark was three people wrapped in one: the nobody, the somebody, and the alien. All of them felt lonely, felt less than and ‚Äòother‚Äô, and whilst Clark clung to the idea that the farm boy from Kansas, raised by the unconditional love of two people he would always consider to be his Ma and Pa, was his truest self, he couldn't help but wonder. Doubt. Become lost in the spaces between each name thrust upon him. No one really knew him, because he didn't really know himself. And even when he was surrounded by people, or in the quiet intimacy of Lois‚Äô arms, that never really went away.Multifaceted but not whole. Just like Jor-El‚Äôs collection of crystals."¬†Clark feels as Clark always feels - like an outsider. He at least gets an invitation to Bruce Wayne's latest gala.
